title: Presidential Memorandum for the Secretary of State, 4-30-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 30, 2009

 



Presidential Memorandum for the Secretary of State, 4-30-09




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary   For Immediate Release                    April 30, 2009   April 30, 2009  MEMORANDUM FOR THE SECRETARY OF STATE  SUBJECT:   Delegation of Certain Functions Under Sections 603-604 and 699 of the Foreign Relations Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 2003 (Public Law 107-228)   By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including section 301 of title 3, United States Code, I hereby delegate to you the functions conferred upon the President by sections 603-604 and 699 of the Foreign Relations Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 2003 (Public Law 107-228).   You are authorized and directed to transmit this determination and certification to the appropriate committees of the Congress and to publish it in the Federal Register.   BARACK OBAMA # # #
